MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW3 and CW5 postcode areas of Crewe and Nantwich, affecting properties in Hankelow, Hatherton, Audlem and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs needed to damaged overhead line equipment. Our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:40AM on 10th April 2021
